mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA Q LEFT OUTER JOIN QNAFILES QF USING(BOARDNUM) WHERE BOARDNUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (BOARDNUM, BOARDTITLE, BOARDDATE, BOARDCONTENTS, BOARDHIT, USERNAME, BOARDREF, BOARDSTEP, BOARDDEPTH) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, sysdate, #{boardContents}, 0, #{userName}, (SELECT BOARDREF FROM QNA BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}), (SELECT BOARDSTEP+1 FROM QNA BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}), (SELECT BOARDDEPTH+1 FROM QNA BOARDNUM=#{boardNum)})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET BOARDSTEP=BOARDSTEP+1 WHERE BOARDREF =(SELECT BOARDREF FROM QNA WHERE BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}) AND BOARDSTEP>(SELECT BOARDSTEP FROM QNA WHERE BOARDNUM=#{boardNum})
